title: Family Duplex Retreat with Spacious Garden on Suwałki's Tranquil Edge
description: This delightful duplex offers a warm welcome with its 4 generous bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms, making it ideal for larger families. Featuring energy-efficient windows, a cozy atmosphere, and thoughtful architecture that ensures ample sunlight throughout the year. The main floor flows seamlessly onto a sunny outdoor terrace and private grassy garden perfect for children and pets to play. The practical heated driveway keeps winter mornings stress-free.
neighborhood_description: Północne is known for its peaceful streets and eco-conscious community, providing residents with a balanced lifestyle. With direct highway access, travel into Suwałki's center or excursions to nature are both within easy reach. Nearby green spaces and relaxed pace of life make this a true haven for those valuing tranquility and space.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to highways for quick travels
balanced lifestyle with space to roam
target_buyer: Ideal for families and pet owners seeking extra space, safety, and a strong connection to nature and balance. Especially suited for those prioritizing comfort, efficient travel, and peaceful community living.
market_positioning: This family-focused duplex stands out for its modern amenities and rare combination of space, privacy, and countryside charm. Priced competitively in the local market, it's an inviting choice for buyers seeking contemporary living on Suwałki's idyllic outskirts.
